title: Introducing: character.
body:
We get a lot of unsolicited emails here at CitR.

It comes with the territory, when you’re running the coolest blog in the country then all the bros are going to want to email you about their latest buzz tracks, it stands to reason.

Me and Josh are the first to suggest personality, transparency and friendliness as the means of get a bloggers attention, however in reference to this track sent to me by the interestingly named **Character.** it was his anonymity combined with small droplets of information that really struck me.

The subject bar read: Tribes ii, I. The sender: Yes.

The email itself included the link, and the words ‘a new thing from Brighton’.

Now am I going mad or is this the sickest beat dropped so far this year?
